programme.title: Generasi Gamerz Ep02
programme.desc: "Streamer" popular Norreen dan Norhayati memilih watak mereka dan saling mencabar satu sama lain (dan ibu mereka) di dalam permainan Mobile Legends yang cukup mendebarkan.

programme.title: Generasi Gamerz Ep03
programme.desc: "Streamer" popular Fattah serta Uncle Dyyi menghidupkan enjin mereka dan mencabar satu sama lain (dan ibu mereka) dalam permainan Rocket League.

programme.title: Dee The Series Ep04
programme.desc: Dee, bersama ibunya, Amy dan adiknya Mia memulakan hidup baru di Kuala Lumpur apabila Amy mendapat kerja baru di sebuah kolej swasta. Bermulalah satu dunia yang baru untuk Dee di kolej itu.

programme.title: Strawberi Karipap The Series Ep08
programme.desc: Nini (Mia Sara) dan Haikal (Rykarl) iaitu adik beradik tiri menjadi bosan apabila asyik bertukar rumah, justeru mereka merancang untuk menyatukan Hairi dan Lisa iaitu penjaga sementara mereka.

programme.title: Beyblade Metal Fusion Ep26
programme.desc: Tsubasa membuktikan kelayakannya sebagai blader dan menyertai organisasi Dark Nebula.

programme.title: Krasue: Inhuman Kiss
programme.desc: Seorang gadis yang mewarisi sumpahan di mana kepalanya terpisah dari badan pada waktu malam untuk memburu dan meratah daging manusia.

programme.title: Sneak Peek i-Tanggang Ep22
programme.desc: Sneak Peek episod 9. Saksikan 'i-Tanggang' setiap Isnin pukul 9 malam di Astro Citra saluran 108.

programme.title: XX Ray
programme.desc: Penemuan XX Ray - sebuah alat yang membolehkan seseorang melihat menembusi sesuatu objek, menjadi malapetaka apabila Anuar menyeludupnya keluar dan membawanya ke satu majlis.

programme.title: Panik
programme.desc: Seorang ibu menjadi panik bila anaknya yang mengidap asma diculik dan dia cuba meminta pertolongan daripada seorang bekas polis yang mempunyai masalah sendiri.

programme.title: Love, Nora
programme.desc: Raoul yang kematian isteri, sering mendapat emel dari isterinya untuk terus tabah meneruskan hidup dan membina hidup baru. Lakonan Yasmin Hani, Will Quah & Yana Shamsuddin.

programme.title: Kupilih Jalanku Sendiri
programme.desc: Rafazah seorang peguam pencegah rasuah tetapi ternyata bapa mertuanya terlibat dalam rasuah yang akan mempertaruhkan nama baiknya. Mampukah Rafazah berhadapan dengan masalah tersebut?

programme.title: Shiba Shiba Doo
programme.desc: Sekumpulan sahabat telah terlanggar seorang lelaki dan membuat perancangan untuk masuk ke hutan bagi menanam mayat tersebut. Keadaan bertambah cemas apabila mereka diburu oleh seorang pembunuh bersiri.

programme.title: Trailer Cinta Round 1
programme.desc: Saksikan trailer 'Cinta Round 1' lakonan Izzue Islam, Azar Azmi dan ramai lagi. Telefilem ini akan ditayangkan pada 13 Nov 2021 jam 9 malam hanya di Astro Citra CH108.

programme.title: Sihir Pemisah
programme.desc: Kebahagiaan Aryani dan Musyid telah menimbulkan rasa cemburu seseorang yang telah menggunakan ilmu hitam untuk meruntuhkan rumahtangga mereka.

programme.title: Rendel
programme.desc: Seorang pengawal bertopeng dalam misi membalas dendam dan berhadapan dengan sebuah organisasi jenayah yang besar dikenali sebagai VALA.

programme.title: Puteri Impian
programme.desc: Impian Nora, seorang gadis kilang menjadi puteri raja menjadi kenyataan apabila memenangi peraduan yang dianjurkan stesen TV. Lakonan Amy Mastura.

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Cinta Round 1
programme.desc: Saksikan tayangan perdana 'Cinta Round 1' lakonan Izzue Islam, Azar Azmi dan ramai lagi. Telefilem ini akan ditayangkan pada 13 Nov 2021 jam 9 malam hanya di Astro Citra CH108.

programme.title: i-Tanggang Ep09
programme.desc: Erma terbaring atas lantai, penuh dengan darah. Esra meyakinkan Khalil dan Syafiq untuk mereka cerita dan berjanji untuk tutup mulut. Tetapi tanpa mereka sedar jiran sebelah rumah ada CCTV!

programme.title: Janji Jantan
programme.desc: Kisah misteri seorang lelaki bernama Jantan yang meninggal dunia dan jenazahnya tidak mampu di angkat untuk dikebumikan. Apakah sebenarnya yang berlaku di sebalik kejadian tersebut?

programme.title: Blood Valentine
programme.desc: Salah satu peraturan utama institusi Valentine Blood adalah tidak boleh jatuh cinta. Namun, Rinrada jatuh cinta kepada Sun, yang membuatkan Chris memutuskan untuk menyingkirkan Sun.

programme.title: Ghairah
programme.desc: Dani gembira mendapat peluang kedua apabila dia tersedar daripada koma namun kegembiraan hanyalah sementara apabila hidupnya dikongkong oleh sang isteri yang 'psiko'.

programme.title: Dorm Melati
programme.desc: Adam dan kawan-kawannya pergi ke kem musim panas di sebuah tempat yang dikenali sebagai 'Dorm Melati'. Adam merahsiakan tentang kisah-kisah hantu rumah itu tetapi rahsia itu terdedah sendiri.

programme.title: Karya 12-Alien Janda Baik
programme.desc: Kisah tentang sekumpulan makhluk asing yang terhempas di bumi dan cuba mencari jalan pulang. Pelbagai kejadian pelik terpaksa ditempuhi demi untuk pulang ke tempat asal.

programme.title: Citra Exclusive: 27 Hari Mencari Mustafa
programme.desc: 10 tahun yang lepas, Mustafa menghilangkan diri setelah isterinya difitnah oleh ayahnya. Kini, ibunya tenat dan ayahnya terpaksa membuang egonya untuk mencari Mustafa di Chennai,iaitu lokasi terakhir Musta

programme.title: Hey Orang Kita
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai 4 pemuda pemudi yang tinggal di blok flat kos rendah yang sama, sentiasa menyokong dan membantu antara satu sama lain untuk bertahan di kota metropolitan ini.

programme.title: Selamat Pagi Cinta
programme.desc: Sebuah filem yang menggabungkan kisah cinta yang berlainan latar belakang. Lakonan Nur Fazura, Sharifah Amani dan Que Haidar.

programme.title: Mr Drift
programme.desc: Dua beradik yang berbakat dalam sukan motorsport drift bakal berentap dan bersengketa angkara perasaan cemburu, dendam dan persaingan yang diakibatkan oleh seorang wanita dan pengurus mereka.

programme.title: Sneak Peek i-Tanggang Ep23

programme.title: Citra Exclusive: Kitab Sijjin
programme.desc: Adi merupakan seorang anak yang taat dan soleh, namun segala-galanya berubah selepas orang tuanya meninggal dunia dan dia mula menyalahkan takdir dan menjadi samseng.

programme.title: Deadly Contract
programme.desc: Yan Jian, jurutera IT dari China memasuki pertandingan di Afrika untuk memenangi hak mengawal sisten komunikasi antara Barat dan Timur. Yan mendapati wujudnya konspirasi dalam pertandingan tersebut.

programme.desc: Mengikuti Biba, seekor ikan mullet merah muda, mempunyai buku nota khas. Dia menuliskan impian, harapan, ketakutan, pengalaman dan pengembaraan yang penuh dengan kegembiraan

programme.title: Ragam Ep01

programme.desc: Sebuah stagecom yang akan menampilkan empat orang selebriti tetap (melatah) yang menjadi pekerja di stesen TV, seorang pengacara yang merupakan sebagai CEO di stesen TV

programme.title: Tok Kata Ep06
programme.desc: Merupakan sebuah program 'Game Show' yang berkonsepkan 'Tradisi'

programme.title: Rumah Rara Ep03

programme.title: Oggy & the Cockroaches Ep52

programme.title: Putri Untuk Pangeran Ep93
programme.desc: Mel berusaha untuk mencari Pangeran, dia membuat satu hantaran di Instagram dan memberi hadiah kepada sesiapa yang berkongsi gambar tentang lokasi pangeran.

programme.title: Isteri Tuan Ihsan Ep19

programme.title: Silsila Badalte Rishton Ka Ep80

programme.title: Awang Spanar

programme.title: Roh
programme.desc: Deep in a forest, a prophecy of death by a strange child unleashes terrifying events on a mother and her two children. Inspired by a Japanese horror classic, this was Malaysia's submission to the Oscars.

programme.title: Baba Yaga: Terror of the Dark Forest
programme.desc: After a new nanny comes into his house and puts his parents in a trance, Egor and his friends investigate this dangerous caretaker and try to save his family.

programme.title: Mistik
programme.desc: Sekumpulan pelajar terjebak dalam satu ekspedisi ilusi di Pulau Bayu Biru yang penuh misteri. Lakonan Lisdawati, Farid Kamil, Cico, Ezat Exist, Julia Hana dan ramai lagi.

programme.title: 7 Perhentian
programme.desc: Amir bertemu dengan Sue di lebuhraya PLUS ketika dalam perjalanan ke Johor Bharu dari Kuala Lumpur. Mereka berhenti di 7 perhentian untuk lebih mengenali antara satu sama lain. Namun destinasi mereka berak

programme.title: Villa Angker Lembang
programme.desc: When an offer seems too good to be true, it probably is. Kemal buys into a haunted resort, and now he must fight for the survival of his family.

programme.title: Anak Ibu
programme.desc: Julia takes good care of her paralyzed and bedridden mother, but things are not what they seem to be.

programme.title: Kembang Kantil
programme.desc: Alisa cannot help but be shaken when she meets her adopted niece, Tania, for the first time. Her investigations bring her to an orphanage, where the truth about Tania is finally revealed.

programme.title: Aku Tahu Kapan Kamu Mati
programme.desc: Sienna's ability to see the sign of when people will die, really frightens her. The more she tries to forget, the more people she knows died, one by one.

programme.title: Anak Perjanjian Syaitan
programme.desc: Due to his mother's pressure and ill treatment, Zaidi and his wife move to a village mansion belonging to his grandmother where they are haunted by strange dreams and the eerie screams of babies.

programme.title: Haunting Of The Mary Celeste
programme.desc: A researcher and her crew try to link the mysterious disappearance of sailors aboard a ship to the supernatural.

programme.title: The Phone
programme.desc: After his wife's murder, Dong-ho's life and law career fall apart. A year later, he receives a phone call from her. He finds that he is talking to her on the day of her murder. Will he be able to save her?

programme.title: Muni
programme.desc: A man gets possessed by a ghost to take revenge on its murderer.

programme.title: 12:06 Rumah Kucing
programme.desc: Since his daughter brought home some stray cats, Randy and his family experience frightening phenomena in their home at midnight everyday. Things go out of hand, when their daugher is possessed.

programme.title: Indera Ke Enam
programme.desc: Since moving into the house, a woman starts experiencing strange visions. No one believes her at first, until her daughter's friend starts to investigate the history of the house.

programme.title: Ghost Mask
programme.desc: Miyu's search for her missing sister takes a tragic turn for the worse when she she slowly uncovers the true identity lying beneath the masks of of those whom she holds dear.

programme.title: Pemain Kaset
programme.desc: In an old abandoned house, a film crew turns off a radio player that is playing Quranic verses on loop. Strange things start happening.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Skeptical professor Phillip Goodman embarks on a trip to the terrifying after being given a file with details of three unexplained cases of apparitions.

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: A tale of vengeance that translates as an LSD trip in the sweltering desert heat, replete with satanic cult, biker gang, heavy metal and Nicolas Cage shooting an arrow. Nuff said. A gory fantastical treat!

programme.title: The Closed Ward
programme.desc: A group of people are mysteriously trapped in an abandoned hospital, with no clue what fate awaits them.

programme.title: Heaven & Hell
programme.desc: Fans of 'found-footage' horror should not miss these three short tales made up of images from surveillance cameras set up in a creepy mansion, a convenience store and finally, in a broken lift.

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: A woman, whose brother died recently, believes she can communicate with spirits. Soon, she starts getting mysterious text messages.

programme.title: Check-in Shock
programme.desc: The film Check-in Shock is the basis for the story of the reality game show, Check-in Shock. With a focus on hate and malice, contestants step into the realm of curses and feuding evil spirits.

programme.title: Kumanthong
programme.desc: Based on true events that happened in Vietnam, a deaf-mute woman marries a psychopathic murderer. She must find a way to expose him and save innocent lives, while finding a way to stay alive.

programme.title: Lampor : Keranda Terbang
programme.desc: Upon the arrival of Netta and her family to her hometown in Temanggung, a demon named Lampor comes alive begins to attacks her children as Edwin begins to suspect that she hides a secret from him.

programme.title: The Bride
programme.desc: A woman named Nastya accompanies her soon to be husband back home to meet his family. Spending her time in their house, she begins to notice an eerie presence and starts questioning her decision to come.

programme.title: Multiverse: The 13th Step
programme.desc: An adventure of a guy and his friends to learn more about a missing girl who stayed in his house previously.

programme.title: Office
programme.desc: To nab a sales manager who's at large after murdering his family, a detective investigates the man's colleagues, who seem to be hiding something.

programme.title: Aku Tahu Kapan Kamu Mati
programme.desc: Sienna's ability to see the sign of when people will die, really frightens her. The more she tries to forget, the more people she knows died, one by one.

programme.title: Evil Ritual
programme.desc: A frustrated, angst-ridden teenage girl awakens something in the woods when she naively performs an occult ritual to evoke a witch to kill her mother.

programme.title: Wacky Races Ep09

programme.title: Inspector Gadget Ep205
programme.desc: When the world's greatest chefs start to go missing, Gadget takes up a chef's position at a restaurant in order to bait the kidnappers.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep09
programme.desc: Ben's fear of clowns emerges at an unfortunate time when our heroes stumble upon a wicked circus with a 'psychic vampire' clown named Zomobozo as its ringmaster.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep07
programme.desc: A new superhero arrives in Townsville to challenge the Powerpuff Girls.

programme.title: Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends Ep12
programme.desc: Berry has set her sights on Bloo.

programme.title: Chowder Ep05
programme.desc: Chowder makes the big mistake of not sharing his gum with Truffles, and soon all of Marzipan City soon ends up in a very sticky situation.

programme.title: Wacky Races Ep29
programme.desc: I.Q. has been secretly working on a time machine to make time and the Racers cars go faster. It backfires and brings future versions of our Racers back to advise their younger selves.

programme.title: Inspector Gadget Ep217
programme.desc: MAD plots to reverse the gravity on Earth, forcing everyone else to float into space. Meanwhile, Gadget believes that he and Brain are already stranded on Mars.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep07
programme.desc: Mojo Jojo tricks Professor Utonium into giving him superpowers.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep36

programme.title: Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends Ep03
programme.desc: When 8-yr-old Mac is forced to give up his Imaginary Friend Bloo, they find Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends, an amazing house for unwanted Imaginary Friends.

programme.title: Talking Tom and Friends Ep210
programme.desc: Talking Tom throws a huge party for the entire town for his first act as mayor, but not everything goes according to plan.

programme.title: Talking Tom Heroes Ep10
programme.desc: Talking Tom Heroes have to protect the town from a crazy creature made of slime and candy. But the slime's so sticky and stretchy! And it's determined to eat every sweet thing it can find - and it won't l

programme.title: Be Cool Scooby-Doo! Ep08
programme.desc: Fred visits The Vault, a high security prison from which no convict has ever escaped. But when a convict ghost terrorises the prison, Fred has to solve the mystery and rethink his stance on justice!

programme.title: The Looney Tunes Show Ep18
programme.desc: Daffy is forced to take a test to get his drivers license after hed discovered driving without one.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show Ep287
programme.desc: Papa tells his version of the Jack and the Beanstalk story.

programme.title: Mighty Mike Ep19
programme.desc: Mike comes up with new plan to win Iris' affection by showering her with a cascade of rose petals. But he'll need to borrow Stephan's leaf blower... while the racoons also want it.

programme.title: Pat the Dog Ep10
programme.desc: Lola finds out that her mother used to be a mini-golf champion. She gathers all her mothers old golf clubs and decides to build a small golf course in the garden.

programme.title: Yabba Dabba Dinosaurs Ep17
programme.desc: Bamm-Bamm is tricked into being an enforcer.

programme.title: Barbie Dreamhouse Adventure Ep20
programme.desc: Barbie and Daisy take a trip to Willows, Wisconsin, Barbie's hometown, where it's up to Barbie to save her beloved Aunt Adele's struggling inn.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show Ep288
programme.desc: The gang get more than they bargained for when they try to shoo away a seemingly docile spider.

programme.title: Talking Tom and Friends Ep514
programme.desc: The friends have to teach the MC to act like a normal adult when his unhip parents come to town.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings Ep100
programme.desc: Grizzy needs a nice nap. He can't find a pillow comfortable enough to his taste until he tests the pillow that the Lemmings use as a high-jump mat.

programme.title: Bunnicula Ep99
programme.desc: The pets go to a monster convention and realize Bunnicula is famous

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep130
programme.desc: Porky falls in love with Petunia, queen of the land. His 'Fairy Duckmother' Daffy gives him a makeover so he can go to the ball.

programme.title: Mighty Mike Ep20
programme.desc: When Mike puts on a magic show and multiplies objects with a flick of his wand, the racoons decide to steal his wand so they can turn their chicken wing into a sumptuous feast.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings Ep98
programme.desc: The fridge in the cabin has changed: it's been replaced by a brand new state-of-the-art appliance which analyzes the body fat percentage of whoever wants to serve himself.

programme.title: Taffy Ep11
programme.desc: A freak accident leads Bentley and Taffy to switch bodies.

programme.title: The Tom & Jerry Show Ep01
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are vacationing at a posh ski lodge in the mountains. Each one tries to outshine the other on the slopes, particularly when a pretty girl cat shows up.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Theatricals Ep16
programme.desc: Tom is ordered by a ship captain to keep the boat free of mice.

programme.title: Wacky Races Ep10
programme.desc: Penelope, Peter, Tiny and Bella take the roles of the Three Musketeers in a wacky and action packed version of The Man in the Iron Mask.

programme.title: Inspector Gadget Ep205
programme.desc: When Dr. Claw plots to destroy all of the Earth's plants, Penny and Talon reluctantly team up to save the planet. Gadget mistakes a baboon for a helpful ally.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep10

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep07
programme.desc: Mojo Jojo tricks Professor Utonium into giving him superpowers.

programme.title: Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends Ep04
programme.desc: Bloo breaks a statue of Madame Foster.

programme.title: Chowder Ep05
programme.desc: When Chowder discovers a lonely monster in the forest, the whole gang soon has to find a way to escape from their emotionally needy new 'friend'.

programme.title: Wacky Races Ep30
programme.desc: Tiny receives an invitation to speak at his old high school. Tiny doesn't want to go because he won't fit in well at Miss Prissy Prisswell's Finishing School for Young Ladies, Gentlemen and Others.

programme.title: Inspector Gadget Ep216
programme.desc: Dr. Claw wants to steal a super-sizing ray to create an army of enormous henchman, but Talon accidentally gigantifies MADcat instead!

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep08
programme.desc: A paste-eating classmate transforms into a destructive monster in 'Paste Makes Waste'.

programme.desc: Bloo breaks a statue of Madame Foster.

programme.desc: Talking Ben joins a club for geniuses, but his new friends and his old friends don't get along.

programme.title: The Looney Tunes Show Ep16
programme.desc: Daffy gets roped into babysitting by his girlfriend.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show Ep289
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger forget Tom's birthday, the tomcat moves in with the one person who appreciates him -- the local Zoo's gorilla, Cuddles.

programme.title: Mighty Mike Ep01
programme.desc: Mike wants to impress Iris by making some yummy tacos, but Fluffy and the Turtles use the extractor fan as a makeshift skydiving game. Then the racoons break in and try to steal the TV.

programme.title: Pat the Dog Ep11
programme.desc: After another twisted move from the Guanos the sausage truck breaks down in front of Lola's house. The little girl is in charge of guarding the truck.

programme.title: Yabba Dabba Dinosaurs Ep19
programme.desc: Dino meets a dinosaur who looks exactly like him.

programme.title: Barbie Dreamhouse Adventure Ep24
programme.desc: Barbie and her friends try to wow Nikki's fashion idol at a Mermaid Convention, but things take a fishy turn when Barbie's sisters become suspects in a mystery.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show Ep290
programme.desc: To Tom and Jerry's delight Ginger's new no junk food in the house diet causes Rick to sleep walk every night to the local fast food joint.

programme.title: Talking Tom and Friends Ep515
programme.desc: When Talking Hank hates the new 'Bongo and McGillicuddy' video game, he sets out on a crazed mission to destroy every copy.

programme.desc: Phoebe and Justin are forced to go to sleep by their Mom, but their dreams are full of memories of their play date with Daffy Duck.

programme.desc: Grizzy thinks he's discovered the gadget for good living.

programme.desc: This broad selection of drama series genres includes romance, military and family connections, captured in China's great classics.

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Alexander Fu stars as a young carriage driver who finds love and encounters peril after he rescues a girl from being harassed by a dangerous group.

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: This award-winning film is Cheng Pei Pei's screen debut, and depicts life and love in a fishing village captured by two pairs of young lovers.

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: The great martial clans of China seek to meet with the new Sun and Moon Sect leader and hatch a plan to resist invaders from the west.

programme.title: Na Cha the Great
programme.desc: A young rebel goes into legend after being reincarnated to save his people from their tyrannical emperor.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: Martial arts maestro Lo Wei wrote, directed and co-starred in this tale of greed and lust for financial gain that depicts a family brought to its knees.

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: Lo Lieh finds himself involved in romance, court intrigue and deadly jousts while trying to protect a baby who is the Emperor's secret heir apparent.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: Award-winning director Chang Cheh depicts the struggle of the Shaolin monasteries when the Ching Dynasty sets trap to separate and destroy them.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Playfulness abounds and innocence is lost in this tale of two naughty females who grow up and discover boys together.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Screen idol Derek Yee is the ambitious 'Meteor' master who becomes obsessed with sword supremacy and goes on a selfish rampage of violence and sex.

programme.title: Till the End of Time
programme.desc: A singer struggles against the odds to keep her career and marriage intact. Starring Jenny Hu, Peter Chen Ho.

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Catch superstar, Linda Lin Dai, in one of her most acclaimed roles in this story of forbidden love between a country maiden and the emperor.

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: In Part 2 of this adventure, only the title weapons' union can save the 6 remaining sects which vie for mastery of the martial world.

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The film's curious title refers to two props that signal a happy beginning to what develops into a tragic love story, linking a scholar and a local beauty.

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: After a man's household pays dearly for his faith in his business rival, he turns to his swordmate and that man's son for help.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Directed by the legendary Chang Cheh, this rousing tale presents a fictional account of the famous Italian explorer's adventures.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, this Huangmei Opera is a heady mix of love, betrayal, murder, and redemption.

programme.title: Vengeance of a Snow Girl
programme.desc: Enjoy Lo Wei's very last Shaw Brothers film, the fabulous tale featuring Li Ching of a frostbitten swordswoman out to get her parents' murderers.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: In this retelling of China's most popular romance, superstar Ivy Ling Po plays a scholar who tries to seduce a servant.

programme.title: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
programme.desc: Winner of Best Martial Arts Award at the 1978 Asian Film Festival, this piece is directed by Liu Chia-liang and features his brother, Gordon, as a martial arts master.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: This heartwarming 1963 musical from Shaw Brothers tells the tale of a beautiful shepherdess, whose own problems drag her into a love triangle.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: In this award-winning Chang Cheh film, David Chiang plays a psychotic who stops at nothing to avenge his elder brother's death.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: Based on a famed Chinese opera, this melodramatic film depicts the romance between Zhang Sheng, an impoverished scholar, and Ying Ying, who is from a wealthy family.

programme.title: The Convict Killer
programme.desc: Director Chor Yuan teams with star Ti Lung and famed novelist Chu Yu in the creation of this intriguing kung fu saga.

programme.title: Temple of the Red Lotus
programme.desc: When the family that a man named Wu (Jimmy Wang Yu) marries into comes under repeated attack, he suspects that his in-laws are bandits.

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: After Ah Niu gets out of jail, he gets involved again with his crooked Uncle Chou and caught in other rackets and silly situations.

programme.title: Return to the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: In this comedic sequel to the 36th Chamber of Shaolin, Gordon Liu is hired to impersonate the 36th Chamber's founder!

programme.title: Torrent of Desire
programme.desc: Flames of lust burn strongly in this high-octane melodrama that stars Jenny Hu, Yang Fan and Qiao Zhuang.

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: When MMA Diva Xin Lan suffers a defeat to He Hua and loses her father's club, an injured Xin Lan seeks out a retired fighting legend to help reclaim her honour.

programme.title: Temporary Family
programme.desc: In order to meet his girlfriend's financial ultimatum, Siu Long decides to flip a penthouse. However, he ends up living with the other three investors when things go south.

programme.title: Love Revolution
programme.desc: Shortlisted at the 9th Okinawa International Movie Festival, Sam Lee's action romance depicts a spirited woman who sets out to rescue her dope-running boyfriend, when he is kidnapped in Thailand.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: Renowned conductor Yin Tze Long agrees to lead a pilot program training 3 underperforming school choirs to participate in an inter-school choral competition.

programme.title: Justice Sung Sai Kit
programme.desc: Tat Ming Cheung meets a mysterious girl who takes him back in time to the Qing dynasty, where he rises to the role of famed judge Sung Sai Kit and restores justice to the land.

programme.title: Colour of the Game
programme.desc: The final chapter of Wong Jing's Colour Trilogy. Jordan Chan and Simon Yam bring you into the criminal underworld of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: To escape a love affair gone bad, Yanny heads to San Jose to visit an old friend, Ling, and her husband. But what seems an ideal, carefree existence hides some unspeakable secrets.

programme.title: 10,000 Miles
programme.desc: In his first movie as a producer, Jay Chou went the distance for his multi-billion ultramarathon film by bringing in a top-notch VFX team from Hollywood.

programme.title: The Game Changer
programme.desc: Two brothers who have gone through life and death together now become adversaries after they get involved with Shanghainese gangster, Mr. Tong, who aims to dominate the city.

programme.title: My Alien Girlfriend
programme.desc: Yuen Qiu, Susan Shaw & Law Kar Ying star in this comedy about Angela, who comes to earth for the first time to look for her brother, who came looking for love. But it is her who finds it in a kind man.

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Starring Huang Xuan & Liu Hao Ran, this winner of five awards tells the legend of a demon cat who disrupts the peace during the Tang Dynasty, causing a series of strange events.

programme.title: Love Contractually
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, Sammi Cheng plays a beautiful CEO who decides to "borrow" sperm from a man to have her own child. This is also her first collaboration with Joseph Cheng.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: Helmed by four Best Actors and set in Hong Kong in the 1970s, this exciting action film charts how the ICAC dealt with corruption within the police force in its early stages of establishment.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A remake from the Japanese movie Key of Life, Andy Lau, Xiao Yang and Wan Qian stars in this action comedy about the switched identities of an unsuccessful actor & a professional assassin.

programme.title: Peace Breaker
programme.desc: Aaron Kwok & Wang Qian Yuan, two Best Actor award winners, do battle in this Chinese thriller about a corrupt cop who accidentally kills a person and sets in motion one of the worst days of his life.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A young family anticipates much joy when they move to a harmonious new neighbourhood. However, they are soon to find that things only look perfect on the surface.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: This modern-day Cinderella story brings together a man and a woman, who not only come from different worlds but get off on the wrong foot. Will their differences ruin their chance at love?

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: This Singaporean-Malaysian comedy starring Chapman To & Mark Lee revolves around Tin Ba, whose winning streak inspires him to challenge the King of Mahjong in the world championship.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Disgraced by a lady fighter named Chun, the Grandmaster Fei Lung's unexpected romantic feelings towards her threatens to derail his win in the final fight he has challenged her to.

programme.title: The Founding of an Army
programme.desc: This HKFA nominee tells the epic story behind the founding of the People's Liberation Army in China that ultimately laid the foundation for a new republic. Featuring 60 all-star cast members!

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: An uplifting sports drama focusing on a property agent who leads an aimless, unfulfilling life & his P.E teacher, as they seek to find purpose in their lives.

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A hitman escapes the triad after an assignment goes awry. He meets a woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, the triad is still hunting for him.

programme.title: Girl's Generation
programme.desc: From Malaysia's Ah Niu, Teddy Chin & China's Zhao Yu, this film features a multi-national cast in a story of high school students & the growing pains they face.

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: When an armored car is hijacked in broad daylight, it sparks a wave of bloody heists. To stop the ruthless group of robbers, an inspector finds himself resorting to playing dirty.

programme.title: With Prisoners
programme.desc: Starring Neo Yau and Kelvin Kwan, this Hong Kong movie portrays young inmates are physically and mentally abused daily in a detention centre.

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: Rocky Balboa is a Philadelphia club fighter who seems to be going nowhere but a stroke of fate puts him in the ring with a world heavyweight champion.

programme.title: Species II
programme.desc: A trio of American astronauts becomes instant heroes but back on their ship, something else has set its sights on Earth.

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: A veteran shuttle pilot embarks on a dangerous one-shot space mission to prevent a giant comet from colliding with the Earth.

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: Alicia Silverstone is Cher who believes in 'doing stuff for other people' but when it comes to matters of the heart, especially her own, she's clueless.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: the Squeakquel
programme.desc: After a concert mishap, the singing chipmunks take a break from superstardom and go to school to fit in with kids their age.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: the Road Chip
programme.desc: Believing that they will be abandoned by their human friend after he proposes to his girlfriend, the chipmunks have three days to stop the proposal.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Desperate townspeople hire seven mercenaries to battle a greedy industrialist and his ruthless henchmen in the Old West.

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: In a world where loyalties are easily abandoned and allegiances can be bought, a new and deadlier terrorist threat has emerged - free agent killers!

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow
programme.desc: Johnny Depp plays a fearless constable who has to confront the horrifying legend of the Headless Horseman in this Tim Burton-directed horror.

programme.title: G.I. Joe : the Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: An elite military unit, comprising special operatives known as G.I. Joe, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: An outcast joins the 47 Ronin and together they embark on a quest that challenges them with a series of trials.

programme.title: Music
programme.desc: Drug dealer Zu finds herself becoming the sole guardian of her half-sister, Music, a young non-verbal autistic girl. Explores two of Sia's favourite themes - finding one's voice and creating family.

programme.title: Succession S3 Ep04
programme.desc: Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season 2, Logan Roy begins Season 3 in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances.

programme.title: Insecure S5 Ep03
programme.desc: The final season continues to follow our favorite characters as they evaluate their relationships, in an effort to figure out who and what comes with them in this next phase of their lives.

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm S11 Ep03
programme.desc: Larry David stars as...Larry David in this acclaimed verite-style comedy series that follows him at home, at work and around town, as he lands himself in various predicaments.

programme.title: The Way Back
programme.desc: When an alcoholic former basketball player whose life has fallen apart reluctantly agrees to coach his former high school basketball team, he finds himself journeying towards redemption.

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: It's the re-match of the century as Rocky Balboa takes on Apollo Creed.

programme.title: The Roads Not Taken
programme.desc: Follow a day in the life of Leo (Javier Bardem) and his daughter Molly (Elle Fanning) as she grapples with the challenges of her father's chaotic mind.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow
programme.desc: Johnny Depp plays a fearless constable who has to confront the horrifying legend of the Headless Horseman in this Tim Burton-directed horror.

programme.title: The Sun Is Also a Star
programme.desc: A pragmatic woman from Jamaica falls in love with an equivocal medical student under atypical circumstances, fighting obstacles challenging their love along the way.

programme.title: Emma.
programme.desc: In this glittering satire of social class and the pain of growing up, Emma must adventure through misguided matches and romantic missteps to find the love that has been there all along.

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: An outcast joins the 47 Ronin and together they embark on a quest that challenges them with a series of trials.

programme.title: Music
programme.desc: Drug dealer Zu finds herself becoming the sole guardian of her half-sister, Music, a young non-verbal autistic girl. Explores two of Sia's favourite themes - finding one's voice and creating family.

programme.title: E.T.
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's classic tells the story of how a little boy tries to help a stranded alien return home when it is accidentally left stranded on Earth.

programme.title: The Way Back

programme.desc: Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where they find all the stuff they have to do scary, but the kids get over their fears after hearing Grampy Rabbit's brave story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep422
programme.desc: Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep423
programme.desc: Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep424
programme.desc: Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep425
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep121
programme.desc: A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out.

programme.desc: Sharpen your pencils, because Josh and Blue are going to SCHOOL! While Blue and her friends go through their school day, we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to share at Show and Tell.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Stripes loves his jungle horn, an instrument that can summon all the animals in the jungle. But when a jealous Crusher steals it, Blaze and Stripes must speed after him in a wild chase to get it back.

programme.desc: Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and strange butterflies cause chaos in Adventure Bay! // Chickaletta's statue has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is moving through Adventure Bay underground!

programme.desc: Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into Adventure Bay's cliffs!

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Sir Steel wants to go to the moon and gets Professor Scratch to convert Steel Towers into a space rocket!

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Calvin wants to make a GIANT surprise cake for Kaison. But when his Bigger / Smaller Baking Machine malfunctions, he has to summon his PLAY POWER to prevent a total cake-tastrophe!

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep110
programme.desc: With HQ in a heatwave, it's too hot for CALVIN to play with his new cars. Luckily, it's icy cool in the Kid Cave but it turns his cars into ice balls! He must use his PLAY POWER to find a new way to play!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep205
programme.desc: It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Who's trying to steal Mr. Curry's prized Giant Pumpkin? PC Wells and Paddington are on the case.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the school fair, and do lots of stuff while they're there. Peppa and her friends get their faces painted as tigers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep121
programme.desc: It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep124
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig hides some treasure in his garden, and when Peppa and George come, they have to look for it.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S4 Ep413
programme.desc: Summer is here! Molly, Gil, and the rest of the Guppies celebrate the season with lots of outdoor fun. Gil uses his summer camping skills to rescue Bubble Puppy during the Summer Camp Games!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Blue's friend Magenta is coming over today! We figure out what Blue wants to do with Magenta.We identify opposites and check out animal footprint with our friends Shovel and Pail.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Blue has something exciting to tell everybody! In this game of Blue's Clues, we go on a note finding quest, solving riddles, and following treasure maps to find out the answer to Blue's Big News.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep414
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are joining the police department! With the help of their new police pal, Officer Anna, Blaze transforms into a super-fast police car to lend a helping hand (or tire) to any truck in trouble.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Santiago and Mami team up to take down an old foe and retrieve a lost family treasure.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep502
programme.desc: An ancient relic disappears from Carlos' dig, Tracker and Skye must find the creature that may have taken it. // Mayor Humdinger fakes a toe injury to win a race so the pups build him a mobility device.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but they have lost their tickets!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep301
programme.desc: When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep302
programme.desc: Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it, including the grown-ups. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Calvin accidentally messes up his clothes on the day of the Ultimate Hero Challenge. Luckily, ROBO G helps him create a brand new outfit. But will his PLAY POWER be enough for Calvin to score the trophy?

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Calvin has lost ROBO G's birthday present. It's now being held captive by a mysterious underwater creature that loves shiny objects. Can he summon his PLAY POWER and find it?

programme.title: Ready Set Dance S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Join, your favourite Liger, Twirl as she shows off her signature move and her love for ballet and hip-hop'.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep118
programme.desc: It's a special nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do for her first pajama party. We learn about why it gets dark and light outside and which animals prefer the nighttime.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep123
programme.desc: Rubble decides to nap under a tree at Farmer Yumi's when Adventure Bay gets a huge problem - Alex the Giant! // When Cap'n Turbot needs to get a picture of a rare bird, his French cousin decides to help!

programme.desc: The PAW Patrol heads to the jungle to help their friend Carlos find his lost parrot, Mateo!

programme.desc: Program bual bicara memfokuskan isu kewanitaan, kanak-kanak dan keluarga keseluruhannya dengan menyediakan pelbagai topik menarik.

programme.title: Buletin 130

programme.title: Cukup Derita Itu
programme.desc: Mak Ngah Gayah masih tak berpuas hati dengan Ellani, tak pernah maniskan muka apabila bercakap walaupun Ellani sehabis lembut dengannya.

programme.title: Nafas
programme.desc: Sebaik saja tersedar Khadijah mendapati dirinya berada di hospital. Mama dan abangnya turut berada di sisi. Dengan keadaan Khadijah seperti itu Farid terpaksa menangguh kepulangannya ke Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: Vish: a Poisonous Story
programme.desc: Mysterious deaths take place at Kothari estate. Sabrina, a Vish kanya (venomous lady) is behind these accidents. Sabrina is married to Mohit, the owner of Kothari Estate.

programme.title: Boboiboy
programme.desc: Boboiboy bersama rakan-rakan menyaksikan kedatangan robot angkasa. Robot angkasa mahu Boboiboy menyerahkan kuasa kepada mereka. Robot angkasa bertarung dan berjaya menewaskan Probe dan seterusnya Adu Du.

programme.title: Tuan Rumah Pembantu Rumah
programme.desc: Ketika melayan perasaan menonton cerita Korea, Areen menerima panggilan daripada Taufeeq yang masih merayu-rayu padanya tetapi Areen sempat mempersoalkan hubungan Taufeeq dengan Bella.

programme.title: Maaf Tak Indah

programme.title: Mr. Bibik
programme.desc: Arisya beritahu tentang rancangan Zuhairi pada Firas. Firas terkejut namun dia sekadar mengucapkan terima kasih. Zuhairi tiba-tiba pulang.

programme.title: The Penthouse
programme.desc: Penghuni Hera Palace yang diketuai Seo Jin cuba menganiaya Yoon Hee atas tuduhan penglibatannya dalam kematian Seol A. Mungkinkah terdapat muslihat di sebaliknya? Dapatkah Yoon Hee membela diri?

programme.title: Lover'S Concerto
programme.desc: Anonymous love letters keep coming to Ji-hwan, refreshing his memories 5 years ago of two long-lost best friends, but when love rushed in, who will be left behind?

programme.title: Like for Likes
programme.desc: An arrogant top star and a fussy screenwriter, a meddling chef and a homeless flight attendant, a deaf composer and TV drama producer. They learn to navigate the modern dating world via social media.

programme.title: Forbidden Dream
programme.desc: Two Korean inventors develop a 20-year relationship while advancing the field of astronomy.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective
programme.desc: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran detective team up to prove the innocence of their mutual friend who's been framed for a horrific murder.

programme.title: The Sound of a Flower
programme.desc: In the strict Confucian society of 19th century Korea, a girl takes destiny into her own hands to become Korea's first female master singer in the traditional art of pansori.

programme.title: Hindsight
programme.desc: A hitwoman is hired to keep a close eye on the retired mob boss, but things get complicated when they grow attached to each other at a cooking class...

programme.title: The Big Swindle
programme.desc: Four con artists band together to perform a complex heist against the Bank of Korea, against the police, and against each other.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: Music teacher Sang-Jin was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation...

programme.title: Chronicle of a Blood Merchant
programme.desc: Set in the 1960's after the Korean War, a couple is happily married for 11 years until a rumor spreads around the village that the man isn't the real father of their eldest son......

programme.title: Jazzy Misfits
programme.desc: A jazz singer goes on a day trip with her estranged mother in search of her younger sister. As the two roam around in Seoul, they start to discover a different side to each other that they had never seen.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: In order to maintain peace, a ruthless detective and his ragtag team plan to take down the most feared Chinese gangster in Seoul.

programme.title: The Wailing
programme.desc: Suspicion leads to hysteria when rural villagers link a series of brutal murders to the arrival of a mysterious stranger.

programme.title: No Mercy
programme.desc: On the journey to find her missing younger sister, she discovered the violence and sexual abuse her sister had suffered and is determined to take a revenge.

programme.title: I
programme.desc: Ah-Young who grew up in an orphanage becomes the babysitter of Young-Chae, who is raising a 6-month-old child on her own. One day, her child has an accident and she places all the blame on Ah-Young...

programme.title: Memoir of a Murderer
programme.desc: A retired serial killer with Alzheimer's disease who killed those who have committed sins 'equally worse' fights to protect his daughter from her psychotic boyfriend.

programme.title: Seven Days
programme.desc: A lawyer with a 100% winning rate was threatened to defend and set a murderer free in 7 days to save her abducted daughter. The race against time begins...

programme.title: Love+Sling
programme.desc: Despite having zero interest in the sport, Sung-woong trains to become a top wrestler with his dad's enthusiastic support. When the girl he likes falls for his dad, they begin wrestling for love.

programme.title: A Girl at My Door
programme.desc: A policewoman encounters a young girl in need of help but things become more mysterious as she gets to know her.

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: Shoot Me in the Heart
programme.desc: A young man develops schizophrenia after his mother's suicide. After he meets a kindred spirit at the psychiatric hospital, he forges a plan with the man to escape.

programme.title: The Himalayas
programme.desc: Based on true events, a renowned mountaineer sets out on a mission to Everest to retrieve his late junior climber's body and faces the greatest challenge of his life.

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: Athena: Goddess of War
programme.desc: Set in the same murky world as IRIS, a new group of agents must face off against terrorists and untangle a dangerous conspiracy threatening national security.

programme.title: 3 Meals a Day - Doctors Ep04
programme.desc: The casts of hit drama <Hospital Playlist> return to star in Na PD's new variety show! Watch 'The 99ers'travel to a village to cook home food with fresh ingredients and enjoy a unique vacation.

programme.title: Secret Royal Inspector & Joy Ep01
programme.desc: A comedic, historical period drama that centers around an intelligent but lazy secret agent, and a divorcee woman who holds beliefs ahead of her times while searching for her happiness.

programme.title: You Quiz on the Block 3 Ep07
programme.desc: 'Nation's MC' Yoo Jae-suk and Jo Se-ho throw surprise quizzes to ordinary citizens and passersby on the street. If they guess correctly, the winners can get their prize money right away!

programme.title: May Food Bless You Ep46
programme.desc: Veteran comedians and longtime friends Choi Hwa-jung, Lee Young-ja, Song Eun-yi and Kim Sook listen to viewers' concerns and recommend food to heal their souls.

programme.title: May Food Bless You Ep47
programme.desc: Veteran comedians and longtime friends Choi Hwa-jung, Lee Young-ja, Song Eun-yi and Kim Sook listen to viewers' concerns and recommend food to heal their souls.

programme.title: High School Mystery Club Ep04

programme.title: We Don't Bite Ep05
programme.desc: The 3 'villains' from <Penthouse> will have a special holiday in an empty house. They'll furnish the house to create their own hideout. Guests will join them and enjoy a healing time together.
